title: Enhanced Apple Podcast Categories
introText: As world-wide podcast usage continues to grow exponentially, Apple has launched their new Enhanced Categories, making it easier to describe the content of shows.
bodyHtml:
In early 2019, Apple Podcasts announced substantial changes to the evidently ageing list of categories that were available to classify podcasts. The new enhanced list of categories is a substantial improvement, and includes a far more granular list of sub categories. The new categories also provide some insight into which niches podcasting is exploring.

You can see the updated list of on Apple Connect.
